summary: The Indian Health Service's goal is to improve the health of American Indians and Alaska Natives by providing quality and accessible health care services. However, many IHS facilities are not in good condition and IHS's medical equipment is aging—which can negatively affect patient care. For example, patients' medical conditions can worsen when their care is delayed due to broken equipment. IHS collects information about its...
title: Indian Health Service: Many Federal Facilities Are in Fair or Poor Condition and Better Data Are Needed on Medical Equipment
